content: 60 double_crochet round 6 chain 3 1 double_crochet in same stitch as chain 3 1 double_crochet in each of the next 13 stitches *2 double_crochet in the next stitch 1 double_crochet in each of the next 13 stitches * repeat from * to * until the end of the round note that the last set will only have 4 double_crochet instead of 15 join with slip_stitch 64 double_crochet rds 7 16 or 17 chain 3 continue with *1 double_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch * 64 double_crochet recommended adult hat length = 8 0 to 8 5 inches depending on the size of the adult s head if you stop with 16 rounds you will have a hat that measures approximately 8 0 inches most average-sized adults will fit best in this length add another row if additional length is desired **************************************************************************** adult extra large size note the adult regular size will work for the majority of adults due to stretch in the fit however if you need a very large adult size follow the instructions below *************************************************************************** questions please email acorntreecreations@gmail com as chain 3 1 double_crochet in each of the next 8 stitches *2 double_crochet in the next stitch 1 double_crochet in each of the next 8 stitches * repeat from * to * until the end of the round note that the last set will only have 7 double_crochet instead of 10 join with slip_stitch 67 double_crochet rds 7 16 or 17 chain 3 continue with *1 double_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch * 67 double_crochet see note on recommended adult hat length above finish off the hat and weave in end note weaving in the end is a very important step to ensure that the hat will not unravel be sure to leave a long tail to weave in at least 4 inches if you re not sure how to do this technique a youtube search for crochet weave in end will provide several tutorial videos enjoy your finished hat
